title: Three Bed Apartment for Sale at Onthree20
details:
Three Bedroom Apartment for Sale at Onthree20

OnThree20, 278 Union Place, Colombo 02

- 3 Bedrooms
- 2 Bathrooms equipped with hot water
- 1,280 Square feet
- Fully furnished
- Bedrooms & living area equipped with A/C
- Separate maids room & bathroom
- Floor level between 6 & 9
- Spacious living and dining area with pleasant view overlooking poolside.
- Fully fitted pantry with essential appliances.
- Electrical appliances include microwave, convection oven, washing machine, dish washer & TV.
- Covered parking reserved for one vehicle.

The apartment benefits from a wide range of shared facilities and amenities which include swimming pools, squash court, large gymnasium, over half an acre of landscaped garden & 24 hour security.

The apartment is currently occupied by a tenant on long term rent until Q1 2019 at a rental rate of LKR 265,000 per Month.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
